info.title: match API
info.description: Match Application API, You can read and test  the APIs from this documentation

get.description:
list users

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `list-users`
JSON document containing the API swagger definition

put.description:
update existing user

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `update-user`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the user id to be updated

delete.description:
delete existing user

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `delete-user`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the user id to be updated

jwt_header_Authorization.description:
Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token retrieved via the signin endpoint.".

**Security Scopes**:
  * `list-users`: get users
  * `update-user`: get users
  * `delete-user`: get users
jwt_header_Authorization.name: Authorization
